languages.text: {n}Маражай следит за вашими действиями, пока, наконец, не фыркает.{/n} "Слепые существа... шея, {name}".
{n}Marazhai watches you, then he snorts.{/n} "Blind creatures... {name}, look at the neck."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай следит за вашими действиями, пока, наконец, не фыркает.{/n} "Слепые существа... шея, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai watches you before, then snorts.{/n} "What blind creatures... {name}, neck."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai watches you before, then snorts.{/n} "What blind creatures... {name}, neck."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai watches you, then he snorts.{/n} "What blind creatures... {name}, watch the neck."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai watches you, then he snorts.{/n} "What blind creatures... {name}, watch the neck."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai watches you, then he snorts.{/n} "Blind creatures... {name}, look at the neck."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはあなたを見ると、鼻で笑う。{/n}「なんて目が悪い生き物だ…{name}、首を見ろよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai watches you, then he snorts.{/n} "Blind creatures... {name}, look at the neck."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはあなたを見ると、鼻で笑う。{/n}「なんて目が悪い生き物だ…{name}、首を見ろよ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋冷眼旁观片刻，哼了一声。{/n}“你眼睛瞎了吧……{name}，看脖子。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai watches you, then he snorts.{/n} "Blind creatures... {name}, look at the neck."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋冷眼旁观片刻，哼了一声。{/n}“你眼睛瞎了吧……{name}，看脖子。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vous observe, puis laisse échapper un grognement de dédain.{/n} « Existe-t-il créature plus aveugle... Regardez son cou, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai watches you, then he snorts.{/n} "Blind creatures... {name}, look at the neck."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai vous observe, puis laisse échapper un grognement de dédain.{/n} « Existe-t-il créature plus aveugle... Regardez son cou, {name}. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai te mira y resopla.{/n} «Qué criaturas tan ciegas... {name}, fíjate en el cuello».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai watches you, then he snorts.{/n} "Blind creatures... {name}, look at the neck."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai te mira y resopla.{/n} «Qué criaturas tan ciegas... {name}mirad el cuello».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai beobachtet dich, dann schnaubt er.{/n} "Blinde Kreaturen ... {name}, seht Euch den Hals an."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai watches you, then he snorts.{/n} "Blind creatures... {name}, look at the neck."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai beobachtet dich, dann schnaubt er.{/n} "Welch blinde Geschöpfe ... {name}, achtet auf den Nacken."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Seni izleyen Marazhai, bir anda pofurduyor.{/n} "Kör yaratıklar... {name}, boynuna bak."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai watches you, then he snorts.{/n} "Blind creatures... {name}, look at the neck."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai seni izliyor, ardından pofurduyor.{/n} "Kör yaratıklar... {name}, boynuna bak."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
